W02_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: On the other side of the door, you find a world called Pulchra filled with witches of many colors. Their way of life is under threat from a calamity, and you must watch over this conflict.

W02_EVAR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.text: Your final task as the Watcher awaits. Once you enter the Brilliant Tower, you won't be able to turn back.

W02_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: The Calamity has engulfed all, leaving the Witchdom of Pulchra silent as the grave. There is nothing left for you in this world.

W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_SCAN_DIVA_AMYA_000_DETAIL.text: Pulchra contains many witches for you to watch over. Areas colored red are in particular danger.

W02_EVAR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: Your final task as the Watcher awaits, and once you step into the Brilliant Tower, there's no going back.
